description:
One of Haruno`s manga artist friends, Isuzu, gets her work selected to be adapted into an anime! Worried about the money involved and how busy she`ll be, she confides in Kurokuma and Haruno about how uneasy she feels about everything. The girls worry for Isuzu and, as a change of pace, participate in the Minobu Donburi Walk together.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: First Time for an Anime Adaptation / Calling All Manga Artists! Minobu Walker
Hajimete no Anime-ka / Mangaka Shuuketsu! Minobu Walker
初めてのアニメ化 / 漫画家集結! 身延ウォーカー
